Visualizing Data

Source: vignettes/Visualizing-data.Rmd
Visualizing-data.Rmd
install.packages("tidyverse")
library(tidyverse)
library(tidyplots)

Amounts

Distributions

Proportions 

energy %>% 
  tidy_plot(Year, power_in_gw, fill = energy_source) %>% 
  add_barstack_absolute(bar_width = 0.8) %>% 
  modify_size(80, 60)


energy %>% 
  tidy_plot(Year, power_in_gw, fill = energy_source) %>% 
  add_barstack_relative() %>% 
  modify_size(80, 60)


energy %>% 
  filter(Year %in% c(2005, 2010, 2015, 2020)) %>% 
  tidy_plot(y = power_in_gw, fill = energy_source) %>% 
  add_pie() %>% 
  split_plot(by = Year)


energy %>% 
  filter(Year %in% c(2005, 2010, 2015, 2020)) %>% 
  tidy_plot(y = power_in_gw, fill = energy_source) %>% 
  add_donut() %>% 
  split_plot(by = Year)


energy_week %>% 
  tidy_plot(Date, power_in_gw, color = energy_source) %>% 
  add_line() %>% 
  modify_size(80, 60)


energy_week %>% 
  tidy_plot(Date, power_in_gw, fill = energy_source, color = energy_source) %>% 
  add_area(alpha = 0.3) %>% 
  modify_size(80, 60)


energy_week %>% 
  tidy_plot(Date, power_in_gw, fill = energy_source, color = energy_source) %>% 
  add_areastack_absolute(alpha = 0.3) %>% 
  modify_size(80, 60)


energy_week %>% 
  tidy_plot(Date, power_in_gw, fill = energy_source, color = energy_source) %>% 
  add_areastack_relative(alpha = 0.3) %>% 
  modify_size(80, 60)


###

energy %>% 
  tidy_plot(Year, power_in_gw, fill = energy_type) %>% 
  add_barstack_absolute(bar_width = 0.8) %>% 
  modify_size(80, 60)


energy %>% 
  tidy_plot(Year, power_in_gw, fill = energy_type) %>% 
  add_barstack_relative() %>% 
  modify_size(80, 60)


my_colors <- c("Fossil" = "grey",
               "Nuclear" = "#F6C54D",
               "Renewable" = "#4FAE62",
               "Other" = "#C02D45")

energy %>% 
  filter(Year %in% c(2005, 2010, 2015, 2020)) %>% 
  tidy_plot(y = power_in_gw, fill = energy_type) %>% 
  add_pie() %>% 
  modify_colors(colors = my_colors) %>% 
  split_plot(by = Year)


energy %>% 
  filter(Year %in% c(2005, 2010, 2015, 2020)) %>% 
  tidy_plot(y = power_in_gw, fill = energy_type) %>% 
  add_donut()  %>% 
  modify_colors(colors = my_colors) %>%  
  split_plot(by = Year)


energy_week %>% 
  tidy_plot(Date, power_in_gw, color = energy_type) %>% 
  add_line() %>% 
  modify_size(80, 60)


energy_week %>% 
  summarise(power_in_gw = sum(power_in_gw), .by = c(Date, energy_type)) %>% 
  tidy_plot(Date, power_in_gw, fill = energy_type, color = energy_type) %>% 
  add_area(alpha = 0.3) %>% 
  modify_size(80, 60)


energy_week %>% 
  summarise(power_in_gw = sum(power_in_gw), .by = c(Date, energy_type)) %>% 
  tidy_plot(Date, power_in_gw, fill = energy_type, color = energy_type) %>% 
  add_areastack_absolute(alpha = 0.3) %>% 
  modify_size(80, 60)


energy_week %>%
  summarise(power_in_gw = sum(power_in_gw), .by = c(Date, energy_type)) %>% 
  tidy_plot(Date, power_in_gw, fill = energy_type, color = energy_type) %>% 
  add_areastack_relative(alpha = 0.3) %>% 
  modify_size(80, 60)
